short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Double click on any word to get its meaning in a concise way. An adaptation of Edge browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wordingo is a convenient Chrome extension designed to streamline your vocabulary exploration. With Wordingo, you can effortlessly discover definitions for any word on the web. Simply highlight a word, right-click, and select "Define" from the context menu to instantly access its meaning. Alternatively, double-click on any word for quick definition lookup. Wordingo utilizes an online dictionary API to provide accurate definitions, ensuring you expand your vocabulary seamlessly while browsing.
